images.description: SDSS image showing lenticular galaxy NGC 67 (= PGC 138159), PGC 1185 (also known as NGC 67A and often misidentified as NGC 67), and NGC 68
SDSS image of lenticular galaxy PGC 138159, which is the correct NGC 67
SDSS image showing NGC 67 (= PGC 138159), elliptical galaxy PGC 1185 (also known as NGC 67A and often misidentified as NGC 67) and NGC 68
SDSS image of elliptical galaxy PGC 1185, which is sometimes called NGC 67A, and often misidentified as NGC 67
